categories: Cambium C15 Carved All Weather Saddle
description: A truly modern saddle from Brooks. Spend time in the drops? The narrow profile of the Cambium C15 suits racing and hard riding. It uses supple rubber with a grippy nylon top that won't get slippery in the rain. Its fibreglass reinforced base keeps the weight down, while aluminum rivets give a nod to Brooks' 130-year history.Fibreglass reinforced nylon backplate reduces weight.Waterproof nylon cover is ready for freezing rain and blazing sun.Vulcanized natural rubber top for comfort.Carved out centre channel reduces pressure and discomfort.
name: Brooks England Cambium C15 Carved All Weather Saddle
